item.description:
Shirley has rocked the 4th of July, they've rocked the Landing at Michael's Harborside, let's go check them at the Tap where they will be jamming the night away on another deck.

The Tap has great food and the deck has a good amount of room for dancing.  You never know what is going to happen or who's house you will be able to see from which deck, so make sure you come and join in on the fun.  You will be seeing an awesome band and what better way is there to celebrate an awesome summer night with friends and good music.

You say you don't dance???  Can you tap your foot?  Come on out and join the fun!!

We will meet early grab some dinner and then dance, dance, dance the night away.  Check out the Taps menu: http://www.tapbrewpub.com/menu1.html

Can't make it for dinner but want to come anyways, make sure you put that in your RSVP so we aren't looking for you.

Remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you haven't paid your dues this year this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the deck at table(s), come on out and find us.
item.name: Don't Call me Shirley is on the deck!
